name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 75: The Double Shooting: RayStorm x RayCrisis
overview: This compilation contains PSX ports of RayStorm and RayCrisis in a single disc. Both games are identical to their original ports, except RayStorm lacks the Neu-Tanz remixed soundtrack. A "Main Title" option is added on each game's title screen to return to main title screen.
